AvailabilitySets_ListBySubscription.description: Lists all availability sets in a subscription.

Images_List.title: Gets the list of Images in the subscription. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of Images. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the Images.
Images_List.description: Gets the list of Images in the subscription. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of Images. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the Images.

LogAnalytics_ExportRequestRateByInterval.title: Export logs that show Api requests made by this subscription in the given time window to show throttling activities.
LogAnalytics_ExportRequestRateByInterval.description: Export logs that show Api requests made by this subscription in the given time window to show throttling activities.

LogAnalytics_ExportThrottledRequests.title: Export logs that show total throttled Api requests for this subscription in the given time window.
LogAnalytics_ExportThrottledRequests.description: Export logs that show total throttled Api requests for this subscription in the given time window.

VirtualMachineImages_ListPublishers.title: Gets a list of virtual machine image publishers for the specified Azure location.

VirtualMachineExtensionImages_Get.description: Gets a virtual machine extension image.

VirtualMachineImages_ListOffers.title: Gets a list of virtual machine image offers for the specified location and publisher.

VirtualMachineImages_ListSkus.title: Gets a list of virtual machine image SKUs for the specified location, publisher, and offer.

VirtualMachineImages_List.title: Gets a list of all virtual machine image versions for the specified location, publisher, offer, and SKU.
VirtualMachineImages_List.description: Gets a list of all virtual machine image versions for the specified location, publisher, offer, and SKU.

Usage_List.title: Gets, for the specified location, the current compute resource usage information as well as the limits for compute resources under the subscription.
Usage_List.description: Gets, for the specified location, the current compute resource usage information as well as the limits for compute resources under the subscription.

VirtualMachines_ListByLocation.title: Gets all the virtual machines under the specified subscription for the specified location.
VirtualMachines_ListByLocation.description: Gets all the virtual machines under the specified subscription for the specified location.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_ListAll.title: Gets a list of all VM Scale Sets in the subscription, regardless of the associated resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of VM Scale Sets. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the VM Scale Sets.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_ListAll.description: Gets a list of all VM Scale Sets in the subscription, regardless of the associated resource group. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of VM Scale Sets. Do this till nextLink is null to fetch all the VM Scale Sets.

VirtualMachines_ListAll.title: Lists all of the virtual machines in the specified subscription. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of virtual machines.
VirtualMachines_ListAll.description: Lists all of the virtual machines in the specified subscription. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of virtual machines.

AvailabilitySets_List.title: Lists all availability sets in a resource group.
AvailabilitySets_List.description: Lists all availability sets in a resource group.

AvailabilitySets_Get.title: Retrieves information about an availability set.
AvailabilitySets_Get.description: Retrieves information about an availability set.

AvailabilitySets_CreateOrUpdate.title: Create or update an availability set.
AvailabilitySets_CreateOrUpdate.description: Create or update an availability set.

AvailabilitySets_ListAvailableSizes.title: Lists all available virtual machine sizes that can be used to create a new virtual machine in an existing availability set.
AvailabilitySets_ListAvailableSizes.description: Lists all available virtual machine sizes that can be used to create a new virtual machine in an existing availability set.

Images_ListByResourceGroup.title: Gets the list of images under a resource group.
Images_ListByResourceGroup.description: Gets the list of images under a resource group.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_List.title: Gets a list of all VM scale sets under a resource group.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_List.description: Gets a list of all VM scale sets under a resource group.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_Get.title: Display information about a virtual machine scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_CreateOrUpdate.title: Create or update a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_CreateOrUpdate.description: Create or update a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_Deallocate.title: Deallocates specific virtual machines in a VM scale set. Shuts down the virtual machines and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this virtual machine scale set deallocates.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_Deallocate.description: Deallocates specific virtual machines in a VM scale set. Shuts down the virtual machines and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this virtual machine scale set deallocates.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_DeleteInstances.title: Deletes virtual machines in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_DeleteInstances.description: Deletes virtual machines in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrades_St.title: Starts a rolling upgrade to move all extensions for all virtual machine scale set instances to the latest available extension version. Instances which are already running the latest extension versions are not affected.
VirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrades_St.description: Starts a rolling upgrade to move all extensions for all virtual machine scale set instances to the latest available extension version. Instances which are already running the latest extension versions are not affected.

VirtualMachineScaleSetExtensions_List.title: Gets a list of all extensions in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetExtensions_List.description: Gets a list of all extensions in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetExtensions_Delete.title: The operation to delete the extension.
VirtualMachineScaleSetExtensions_Delete.description: The operation to delete the extension.

VirtualMachineScaleSetExtensions_Get.title: The operation to get the extension.
VirtualMachineScaleSetExtensions_Get.description: The operation to get the extension.

VirtualMachineScaleSetExtensions_CreateO.title: The operation to create or update an extension.
VirtualMachineScaleSetExtensions_CreateO.description: The operation to create or update an extension.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_ForceRecoverySer.title: Manual platform update domain walk to update virtual machines in a service fabric virtual machine scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_ForceRecoverySer.description: Manual platform update domain walk to update virtual machines in a service fabric virtual machine scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_GetInstanceView.title: Gets the status of a VM scale set instance.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_GetInstanceView.description: Gets the status of a VM scale set instance.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_UpdateInstances.title: Upgrades one or more virtual machines to the latest SKU set in the VM scale set model.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_UpdateInstances.description: Upgrades one or more virtual machines to the latest SKU set in the VM scale set model.

VirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrades_St.title: Starts a rolling upgrade to move all virtual machine scale set instances to the latest available Platform Image OS version. Instances which are already running the latest available OS version are not affected.
VirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrades_St.description: Starts a rolling upgrade to move all virtual machine scale set instances to the latest available Platform Image OS version. Instances which are already running the latest available OS version are not affected.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_GetOSUpgradeHist.title: Gets list of OS upgrades on a VM scale set instance.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_GetOSUpgradeHist.description: Gets list of OS upgrades on a VM scale set instance.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_PerformMaintenan.title: Perform maintenance on one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set. Operation on instances which are not eligible for perform maintenance will be failed. Please refer to best practices for more details: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machine-scale-sets/virtual-machine-scale-sets-maintenance-notifications
VirtualMachineScaleSets_PerformMaintenan.description: Perform maintenance on one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set. Operation on instances which are not eligible for perform maintenance will be failed. Please refer to best practices for more details: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machine-scale-sets/virtual-machine-scale-sets-maintenance-notifications

VirtualMachineScaleSets_PowerOff.title: Power off (stop) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources. Instead, use deallocate to release resources and avoid charges.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_PowerOff.description: Power off (stop) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources. Instead, use deallocate to release resources and avoid charges.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_Redeploy.title: Redeploy one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_Redeploy.description: Redeploy one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_Reimage.title: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set which don't have a ephemeral OS disk, for virtual machines who have a ephemeral OS disk the virtual machine is reset to initial state.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_Reimage.description: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set which don't have a ephemeral OS disk, for virtual machines who have a ephemeral OS disk the virtual machine is reset to initial state.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_ReimageAll.title: Reimages all the disks ( including data disks ) in the virtual machines in a VM scale set. This operation is only supported for managed disks.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_ReimageAll.description: Reimages all the disks ( including data disks ) in the virtual machines in a VM scale set. This operation is only supported for managed disks.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_Restart.title: Restarts one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_Restart.description: Restarts one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrades_Ca.title: Cancels the current virtual machine scale set rolling upgrade.
VirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrades_Ca.description: Cancels the current virtual machine scale set rolling upgrade.

VirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrades_Ge.title: Gets the status of the latest virtual machine scale set rolling upgrade.
VirtualMachineScaleSetRollingUpgrades_Ge.description: Gets the status of the latest virtual machine scale set rolling upgrade.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_ListSkus.title: Gets a list of SKUs available for your VM scale set, including the minimum and maximum VM instances allowed for each SKU.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_ListSkus.description: Gets a list of SKUs available for your VM scale set, including the minimum and maximum VM instances allowed for each SKU.

VirtualMachineScaleSets_Start.title: Starts one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSets_Start.description: Starts one or more virtual machines in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Delete.title: Deletes a virtual machine from a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Delete.description: Deletes a virtual machine from a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Update.title: Updates a virtual machine of a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Update.description: Updates a virtual machine of a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Deallocate.title: Deallocates a specific virtual machine in a VM scale set. Shuts down the virtual machine and releases the compute resources it uses. You are not billed for the compute resources of this virtual machine once it is deallocated.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Deallocate.description: Deallocates a specific virtual machine in a VM scale set. Shuts down the virtual machine and releases the compute resources it uses. You are not billed for the compute resources of this virtual machine once it is deallocated.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_GetInstanceVie.title: Gets the status of a virtual machine from a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_GetInstanceVie.description: Gets the status of a virtual machine from a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_PerformMainten.title: Performs maintenance on a virtual machine in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_PerformMainten.description: Performs maintenance on a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_PowerOff.title: Power off (stop) a virtual machine in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources. Instead, use deallocate to release resources and avoid charges.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_PowerOff.description: Power off (stop) a virtual machine in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources. Instead, use deallocate to release resources and avoid charges.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Redeploy.title: Redeploys a virtual machine in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Redeploy.description: Redeploys a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Reimage.title: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) a specific virtual machine in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Reimage.description: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) a specific virtual machine in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_ReimageAll.title: Allows you to re-image all the disks ( including data disks ) in the a VM scale set instance. This operation is only supported for managed disks.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_ReimageAll.description: Allows you to re-image all the disks ( including data disks ) in the a VM scale set instance. This operation is only supported for managed disks.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Restart.title: Restarts a virtual machine in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Restart.description: Restarts a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Start.title: Starts a virtual machine in a VM scale set.
VirtualMachineScaleSetVMs_Start.description: Starts a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

VirtualMachines_List.title: Lists all of the virtual machines in the specified resource group. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of virtual machines.
VirtualMachines_List.description: Lists all of the virtual machines in the specified resource group. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of virtual machines.

VirtualMachines_Delete.title: The operation to delete a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_Delete.description: The operation to delete a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_Get.title: Retrieves information about the model view or the instance view of a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_Get.description: Retrieves information about the model view or the instance view of a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_Update.title: The operation to update a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_Update.description: The operation to update a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_CreateOrUpdate.title: The operation to create or update a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_CreateOrUpdate.description: The operation to create or update a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_Capture.title: Captures the VM by copying virtual hard disks of the VM and outputs a template that can be used to create similar VMs.
VirtualMachines_Capture.description: Captures the VM by copying virtual hard disks of the VM and outputs a template that can be used to create similar VMs.

VirtualMachines_ConvertToManagedDisks.title: Converts virtual machine disks from blob-based to managed disks. Virtual machine must be stop-deallocated before invoking this operation.
VirtualMachines_ConvertToManagedDisks.description: Converts virtual machine disks from blob-based to managed disks. Virtual machine must be stop-deallocated before invoking this operation.

VirtualMachines_Deallocate.title: Shuts down the virtual machine and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this virtual machine uses.
VirtualMachines_Deallocate.description: Shuts down the virtual machine and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this virtual machine uses.

VirtualMachineExtensions_List.description: The operation to get all extensions of a Virtual Machine.

VirtualMachineExtensions_CreateOrUpdate.description: The operation to create or update the extension.

VirtualMachines_InstanceView.title: Retrieves information about the run-time state of a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_InstanceView.description: Retrieves information about the run-time state of a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_PerformMaintenance.title: The operation to perform maintenance on a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_PerformMaintenance.description: The operation to perform maintenance on a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_PowerOff.title: The operation to power off (stop) a virtual machine. The virtual machine can be restarted with the same provisioned resources. You are still charged for this virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_PowerOff.description: The operation to power off (stop) a virtual machine. The virtual machine can be restarted with the same provisioned resources. You are still charged for this virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_Redeploy.title: The operation to redeploy a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_Redeploy.description: The operation to redeploy a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_Reimage.title: Reimages the virtual machine which has an ephemeral OS disk back to its initial state.
VirtualMachines_Reimage.description: Reimages the virtual machine which has an ephemeral OS disk back to its initial state.

VirtualMachines_Restart.title: The operation to restart a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_Restart.description: The operation to restart a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_Start.title: The operation to start a virtual machine.
VirtualMachines_Start.description: The operation to start a virtual machine.

VirtualMachines_ListAvailableSizes.title: Lists all available virtual machine sizes to which the specified virtual machine can be resized.
